title: Find a Doctor
description: Mary-Ellen Taplin, MD - Medical Oncology. Dr. Taplin received her MD in 1986 from the University of Massachusetts, Worcester. She completed a residency in internal medicine and chief residency at the University of Massachusetts Medical Center and an oncology-hematology fellowship at Beth Israel Hospital and Harvard Medical School. Dr. Tap...
